text: Theodore "Ted" Schwinden (August 31, 1925 â€“ October 7, 2023) was an American politician. He served as the 23rd Lieutenant Governor of Montana serving from 1977 through 1981. He later served as the 19th Governor of Montana serving from 1981 through 1989. On October 7, 2023, he died in Phoenix, Arizona, aged 98. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Governors of Montana Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lieutenant Governors of Montana
title: Ted Schwinden
